      • cryptId

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> cryptId(java.lang.String id,
                                                                    java.lang.String pswd,
                                                                    int[] cle)
        This method will encrypt id write by User to check with file
        Parameters:
        id - the ID write in JTextField
        pswd - the password write in JTextField
        cle - the key to encrypt them
        Returns:
        a HashMap with 2 String encrypt (ID and PassWord)

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.lang.String s,
                             java.lang.String fileName)
        This static method will write data from a String to a file it will overwrite if the file already exists the file will be store in a File directory
        Parameters:
        s - The String that will be put in the file
        fileName - The Name of the file
